data.title: Prior Scientific CL150 Fiber Optic Cold Light Illuminator

data.text:
Scout SKX422 Ohaus

New generation! The OHAUS Scout Scale, with its large backlit LCD display and integrated educational (more) software is the ideal tool for use in the classroom. Offering world-class overload protection, fast stabilization times, increased capacity, more connection options, and a stackable design—the ultimate educational weighing experience. - Excellent overload protection and practical stackable design - Backlit LCD display and 4-button operation: very easy to use in all conditions - High weighing speed and high resolution display The OHAUS Scout scale can be equipped with various connectivity options: RS232, USB, USB device, Ethernet or Bluetooth®. These options ensure a more modern and smarter student experience, increasing accuracy and efficiency. Other Standard Features and Equipment Transport lock, stainless steel weighing pan, menu and adjustment lockout switch, software and mechanical overload/underload protection, stability indicator, auto tare, low battery indicator, auto power off user selectable print options and communication settings. Applications Weighing: allows you to calculate the weight of the samples in the selected unit of measure. Density determination: calculation of the density of solids or liquids. With the built-in weigh below hook, you can test for the specific gravity of objects that cannot be placed on the weighing pan. Molar Concentration: Calculate the mass of a sample and automatically convert to the molar concentration. MODELS AVAILABLE: Applications Weighing, determination of density, weighing of moles Screen Liquid crystal display (LCD) with backlight Operation AC adapter (included) or 4 AA batteries (not included) Communication RS232, USB host, USB device, Ethernet or Bluetooth™ (available as an accessory) Construction ABS housing, stainless steel bowl, ABS draft shield (1 mg model only), bottom weigh hook, transport lock, manual calibration lock switch, security slot Project features Stability indicator, stackable design with storage lid included (excluding 1 mg model), mechanical and software over/underload protection, low battery indicator, auto power off, auto tare, span calibration mass included in models with capacity up to 620 g NO MORE BROKEN SCALES! The excellent overload protection of the Scout balance consists of a weighing pan made of high-strength stainless steel and a pan support made of impact-resistant plastic. The system allows the balance to safely support loads up to 10 times its rated capacity, withstanding use in even the most demanding educational environments. In addition, the integrated transport lock protects the load cell from damage during transport, stacking and storage.

€401.00 ex VAT

€477.19 incl. VAT if applicable

Italy

Polyscience AP15R-30-A11B 15L Refrigerated Circulator, -30°C to 200°C, 915W; 120V

Polyscience AP15R-30-A11B 15L Refrigerated Circulator, Advanced Programmable (-30 to 200C), 120V, 60 (more)Hz3D Visualization of the Polyscience CirculatorThe rendered image can be freely rotated in a full 360-degree view, allowing you to zoom in, pause, and explore every angle. For enhanced detail, the rendering can also be displayed in full-screen mode. This 3D model is designed exclusively for visualization purposes and may not accurately represent the actual appearance of your product. Your browser does not support iframes. The Polyscience AP15R-30-A11B 15L Refrigerated Circulator is intended for the precise temperature control ofsuitable liquids in a reservoir. Extremely easy to use and maintain, itcombines design innovation with highly intuitive operation to deliverconvenient and versatile liquid temperature control for a wide range ofapplications.Features Time/temperature programming (ten 100-step programs) Intuitive 4.3” (10.9 cm) SmartTouch display 6 languages: French, German, Spanish, Chinese, Arabic, English Variable speed pump with open- and closed-loop external circulation capability Swivel 180™ Rotating Controller On-board connectivity: USB-A & B, Ethernet, RS-232/RS-485, and external temperature probe Event scheduling (time & date) with real-time clock Review temperature trends for up to 10 days Multiple selectable “home” screens On-screen help Automatic and/or user-adjustable performance optimization 5-point calibration capability Click Here to View Product Video INCLUDED: The Polyscience AP15R-30-A11B 15L Refrigerated Circulator, -30°C to 200°C, 915W; 120V includes: - Power Cord - Operator's Guide - Manufacturer's Documentation - 2 Year Manufacturer's Warranty

$7,343.00 ex VAT

United States

general laboratory equipment other

Ohaus 30573847 ISTHBLHTSN Thermal Shaker, 120V

Ohaus 30573847 ISTHBLHTSN Thermal Shaker, 120V Orbit 3mm Speed Range 300 to 3,000 RPM Heating Rate ( (more)/min) 5°C/min (/min) Features - Best in class temperature performance. Enhanced electronics and software allow for fast and accurate temperature control you can trust. - Intuitive touchscreen for simple operation and programming. - Set the functions and the comprehensive help screens in one of six languages to guide the user through the operation of the unit. - Easily create programs for repeat applications. Storage for five separate, 5-step programs. - The USB port allows the transfer of test data to a flash drive for data logging and program storage. OHAUS Thermal Shakers are designed for heating and cooling applications that require consistentand precise high-speed shaking with dependable temperature control from 17°C below ambient to100°C. Temperature can be user-calibrated when precision is required. Customize applications withinterchangeable blocks to accommodate tubes & microplates. Intuitive touchscreen allows the user toview all steps of the program while monitoring the progress. INCLUDED: The Ohaus 30573847 ISTHBLHTSN Thermal Shaker, 120V includes: - Screwdriver for Block Removal - Detachable 3-wire cord and plug - Operator's Guide - Manufacturer's Documentation - 2 Year Manufacturer's Warranty

$2,200.00 ex VAT
